lead_paragraph: In last-ditch pleas, Democrats and Republicans are reintroducing themselves, tearing down opponents one last time, or something in between.

headline.main: In Ads, Candidates Make Final Pitches to Voters
headline.print_headline: In Ads, Candidates Make Their Final Pitches
